name: Composer - Design System
description:
We have created the most flexible and robust Design System to enable you to easily deploy your brand color scheme, fonts, images, and styles into it. Simple, modular and accessible components that will surely power up your designs.

 

If you want to use this file with your brand identity, you can customize the Composer Theme. In addition, all components are open source and available for production-level React applications. 

 

Use this file in combination of the Composer Design System - Blocks and Surfaces, Composer Design System - Icons and Illustrations, and Composer Design System - Components Tokens. 

 

Learn more about Composer at: cmpsr.io and storybook.cmpsr.io
